00019   // Static members: -------------------------------------------
00020 public:
00021   enum Component {RHO0     = 1,
00022                   NONRES   = 2,
00023                   SIGMA    = 4,
00024                   OMEGA    = 8,
00025                   RHO2S0   = 16,
00026                   F0       = 32,
00027                   F2       = 64,
00028                   F0_1370  = 128,
00029                   KSTP     = 256,
00030                   KSTM     = 512,                              
00031                   KST0_1430P = 1024,
00032                   KST0_1430M = 2048,                  
00033                   KST2_1430P = 4096,
00034                   KST2_1430M = 8192,                 
00035                   KST_1410M  = 16384,
00036                   KST_1680M  = 32768,
00037                   KST_1680P  = 65536,
00038                   SIGMA2     = 131072};
00039                   
00040    static int allComponents() {
00041      return RHO0 + NONRES +
00042        SIGMA + OMEGA + RHO2S0 + 
00043        F0 + F2 + F0_1370 +
00044        KSTP + KSTM + KST0_1430P + KST0_1430M +
00045        KST2_1430P + KST2_1430M + KST_1410M + KST_1680M +
00046        KST_1680P + SIGMA2;
00047    }
00048   
00049

00055                 BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00056                 Int_t componentsBit = allComponents(),
00057                 Int_t defaultRhoSpin = SPIN1);

00063   virtual Double_t m13NormRange() const {return 3.0;}
